{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|num=1|since=c++20|
constexpr auto begin();
}}
{{dcl|num=2|since=c++20|
constexpr auto begin() const
    requires ranges::forward_range&lt;V&gt; &amp;&amp; ranges::forward_range&lt;const V&gt;;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Returns an {{rlpi|outer_iterator}} to the first element of the {{rlpt|lazy_split_view}}.

Let {{rlpsi|/#base_}} be the underlying view and {{rlpsi|/#current_}} be the underlying caching object (may not be present).

@1@ Equivalent to
{{source|1=
constexpr auto begin()
{
    if constexpr (ranges::forward_range&lt;V&gt;)
        return /*outer_iterator*/&lt;/*simple_view*/&lt;V&gt;&gt;{*this, ranges::begin(base_)};
    else
    {
        current_ = ranges::begin(base_);
        return /*outer_iterator*/&lt;false&gt;{*this};
    }
}
}}

@2@ Equivalent to {{c|1=return /*outer_iterator*/&lt;true&gt;{*this, ranges::begin(base_)};}}.

===Return value===
{{rlpi|outer_iterator}} to the first element.
